name: amc-mcp-server
description: MCP server for AMC Theatres APIs - provides tools for listing movies, theaters, showtimes, and reserving tickets

tools.name: list_theaters
tools.description: Find AMC theaters near a specific ZIP code

zip.description: ZIP code to search for theaters near

tools.name: list_movies
tools.description: List currently playing movies at AMC theaters

tools.name: list_showtimes
tools.description: Get showtimes for a specific theater on a given date

theaterId.description: Theater ID to get showtimes for

tools.name: reserve_tickets
tools.description: Reserve tickets for a showtime (stub implementation for future use)

showtimeId.description: Showtime ID to reserve tickets for
